meanings.definition: Suggest or imply in addition to the literal or primary meaning.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds connotes an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The old house connotes history and stories.

meanings.definition: Imply or suggest (an idea or feeling) in addition to the literal or primary meaning.
meanings.sent2: The music connotes a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent3: The empty playground connotes a sense of loneliness.
meanings.sent4: The broken mirror connotes bad luck.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh bread connotes warmth and comfort.
